iti98:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti98:2.2: A gift of material things and a gift of the teaching.
iti98:2.3: The better of these two gifts is the gift of the teaching.
iti98:3.1: There are these two kinds of sharing.
iti98:3.2: Sharing material things and sharing the teaching.
iti98:3.3: The better of these two kinds of sharing is sharing the teaching.
iti98:4.1: There are these two kinds of support.
iti98:4.2: Support in material things and support in the teaching.
iti98:4.3: The better of these two kinds of support is support in the teaching.”
iti98:4.4: That is what the Buddha said.
iti98:5.1: “It is said to be the supreme, ultimate gift,
iti98:5.2: and the sharing praised by the Buddha;
iti98:5.3: what wise and sensible person, confident in the best of fields,
iti98:5.4: would not sow a such timely gift?
iti98:6.1: For those who are diligent in the dispensation of the Holy One,
iti98:6.2: both those who speak and those who listen,
iti98:6.3: confident in the dispensation of the Holy One,
iti98:6.4: such a gift purifies the highest goal.”
iti98:7.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
